text: Nidup Zangpo is a Bhutanese politician who has been a Bhutan Peace and Prosperity Party (DPT) member of the National Assembly of Bhutan from 2013 to 2018. Zangpo gained a Bachelor's Degree in Arts and worked for the Amankora Group before being elected to the National Assembly of Bhutan on July 13th, 2013.http://www.dpt.bt/?page_id=1769 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Bhutanese MNAs 2013–2018 Category:21st-century politicians Category:Druk Phuensum Tshogpa politicians Category:Bhutanese politicians Category:Druk Phuensum Tshogpa MNAs
title: Nidup Zangpo
